text: (ai rasool) tum unase kaho ki (bebas) aao jo cheezen khuda ne tum par haraam kee hain vah main tumhen padh kar sunaoon (vah) yah ki kisee cheez ko khuda ka shareeq na banao aur maan baap ke saath nek sulooq karo aur mufalisee ke khauph se apanee aulaad ko maar na daalana (kyonki) unako aur tumako rizak dene vaale to ham hain aur badakaariyon ke qareeb bhee na jao khvaah (chaahe) vah zaahir ho ya posheeda aur kisee jaan vaale ko jis ke qatl ko khuda ne haraam kiya hai na maar daalana magar (kisee) haq ke aivaz mein vah baaten hain jinaka khuda ne tumhen hukm diya hai taaki tum log samajho aur yateem ke maal ke kareeb bhee na jao
